Summary: No shedding, eats most of the kibbles.
text:
I don't think this is a particularly great dog food. I suspect Nutro is a lot better. But my dog does eat this.

Actually, she eats about half of it, picking out the kibbles that she finds tasty. She leaves one kind of kibble, so we probably throw out 15% of the bag.

My dog sheds terribly if she eats some dog foods, but not this one. No allergic or skin reaction.

So, overall, I think its a good product.
